text: 10:13 Jeremaia 29:11; 1 Korin 1:9; 2 Pita 2:9Osɨmtɨzir ia bativiba, da osɨmtɨzir kabanangɨra, gumazamiziba bar me batifi. Ezɨ God uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn gɨn ghua, osɨmtɨzir ian gavgavibagh afirazɨ tam ateghtɨ, a ia batoghan kogham. Osɨmtɨziba ia bativtɨ, God ian akuraghsɨ tuavim damigham. Tuavir kam kamakɨn: a ia damightɨ, ia tuivigh gavgavigham, eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir kam ia abɨraghan kogham.
